post.body: You *hate* t Cruise, I *know* you do. unless it's Trevor Cruise or someone...
dude! you must have slipped that in when I was typing the comment below. Great! thanks. Did you see @Canucklehead 's for you?
I got Alan's comment all mixed up with mine, works well though :)
It's okay to love the spice girls, not brilliant, but okay... :) I like the bee gees, it beings me woe...
The nutcracker soldier looks comfy between those pillows, eh? what? :)
'Fearsome when you 'Grrrr'. Quite rattled now.
Thanks, I'll try to think of something suitable!
when is your interview with Fox News being shown Stan?
I mean well... :)
Hey Chilly, you know how Santa only comes once a year? Naw, never mind. Ho ho ho... :)
I was being complimentary (and a little obtuse) about @wisdomhypnosis lovely jumper. Beethoven jeans sound great - 501 Symphony?
It took me a few minutes after posting reply, sorry (thick) and thanks again. :)
just now, it's very good. Thanks for playing. :)
Right. I'll take one as a compliment so. A complimentary one... (does Homer Simpson drool)
Hey Dude!! Worse? Well, I've fallen into 'rude'. It had to happen... :)
hope you don't poke Beamers eye out, what would he do then? (giggling)
Is a bb camera like a bb gun? just wondering? Can you shoot small animals with it?
Same as every weekend Pinky, try to take over the world. :) You?
it's catchy :)
here comes the weekend reggie!!
"For it is good to be children sometimes, and never better than at Christmas, when its mighty Founder was a child himself."
Hi Reggie, did you like my 'house' :)
holding a good thought for all these interviews..
Life is old there. Older than the trees... or so I hear. :) Safe journey!
Calvin and Hobbes site looks Brill!! Thanks. Mind if I retweet?
me too!
Sad but true. I am off to walk the Estate now, perhaps shoot a poacher or two. à bientôt
it's nothing personal, just a random memory revived by the word 'Poisson'. Which you used. See? :)
gonna have to try this Tweekdeck, some big hitters getting behind it.
yes, I'm not surprised to hear that. 'Cod' = fish but also con/joke - eg. "you're only codding me".
We had a fishmonger in my town when I was a kid, we used to say 'he put his arse in the window for a cod'. Does that travel?
As is traditional, Pepe Le Pew now loses his nerve and runs away. 'All mouth and no trousers', as we say in Ireland. :)
"Turn out zee lights, darleeng. I know where everything ees."
"I am zee abdominal snowman, no?"
"Come to me, my melon baby collie." :D
Right back at YOU sweetie!!
I am quoting Pepé Le Pew... Philistine!! :)
"Un, deux, trois, quatre, five, sis, sept, huit, neuf, ten."
Erotic French groaning *and* soap. (Flicks to Pepé Le Pew mode) "Ahhh ... la belle femme skunk fatale!! Tch-tch."
Thanks for re-tweeting my sketchers line, I was very proud of it and the world went 'meh'. Don't we just hate that?
Implying you don't love it anymore. Ah well, Ken's hunt for a smile... continues. :)
I DON'T!! :) I'll take a nice smile over a deep cleavage any day... except Thursday.
You have Joie de vivre too. kay? eh? eh? eh?
@deemanuk we'll see, eh. Anyway, I vote for @stephenfry as the next Doctor Who!
she's also a powerful actress who might take the gig. Gender could be 'got over' as easily as everything is 'got over' in DH.
You won't like it! My sons try to strangle me every time I mention it. http://tinyurl.com/7gbdtk I know... gender is a problem
I'd bet it will never be him. I think we may have already seen the next doctor in the last series.. but nobody agrees with me :)
couple of more one off specials and *then* a new doctor
subtle hint ? eh?
I hadn't heard that :( RIP.
Happy Christmas tata. What you're doing is Great!
Hooray Hooray (hic)
And to you! :)
Merry Christmas Dear Reggie, sweet sprite of Christmas and goddess of goodwill... :)
Have a nice family-time Linc, you have all the gear for that. 'best K
He was over Micronesian when I looked with my younger guy, he said 'That's where Survivor was' :)
Hey Beamer, happy Christmas mate! I hope you get a nice picture of yourself as a present - for Twitter use :)
typo - don't ask - carry on!! :)
Happy Christmas Ben and 'L'
"Give gifts that can be experienced": http://tinyurl.com/6ewhnj good advice. ( I want one of those...)
is a fan of Tchaikovsky sweaters
Back later..."Hello, this is Ken Armstrong. At the tone, leave your name and message. I'll get back to you. *beep*
What's that coming over the hill, is it a weekend? http://tinyurl.com/5knalx
New Post - Limerick Competition results. Great entries guys, thanks for playing. :) http://tinyurl.com/55cano
RT: Searchable Calvin & Hobbes!: http://www.transmogrifier.org/ch/strips/index what a find! Thanks @chrisgarrett for RT'ing
Housing horoscopes - absolutely ingenious - and I'm in it! http://tinyurl.com/5z2589 Thank you @Ohiorealtor. @wisdomhypnosis have you seen?
Pepe Le Pew quotes are Great!
"Hey, Lolita, intimacy is difficult at this range."
Three cats named Un, deux and trois went out in a boat. The boat became flooded and went down, headline in paper "Un, Deux, Trois Cat Sank'
Harold Pinter RIP
Mssrs Moet & Chandon gonna have a lot to answer for...
http://tinyurl.com/96bcec A short story of mine, for Christmas...
Happy Christmas to you all! :)
